introduction: To find a lost pension contact the Pension Tracing Service online. You’ll be asked to fill out a form. This service is free.
more_information:
You need to give the Pension Tracing Service as much information as you can, including whether you're looking for a company pension or personal pension.

%The Pension Tracing Service will only give you the address of your scheme provider and it is up to you to make any further enquiries.%

You can also contact the Pension Tracing Service by phone or by post.

$C
**Pension Tracing Service**  

**Telephone:** 0845 6002 537  
**Telephone from abroad:** +44 191 215 4491  
**Textphone:** 0845 3000 169  
Monday to Friday 8am to 6pm  
$C

$A
Pension Tracing Service
The Pension service
Tyneview Park
Whitley Road,
Newcastle Upon Tyne
NE98 1BA
$A
overview: Find a lost pension by contacting the Pension Tracing service online
title: Find a lost pension
